input.name: key
input.description: The key used to sign the token

input.name: signingMethod
input.description: The signing method used (HMAC, ECDSA, RSA, RSAPSS)

input.name: iss
input.description: The 'iss' standard claim to match against

input.name: sub
input.description: The 'sub' standard claim to match against

input.name: aud
input.description: The 'aud' standard claim to match against

output.name: valid
